Description: These were one of my father's backup pairs (he had a "backup" pair in every vehicle, see other auctions). The ear socks and nose pieces are in good shape. The lenses are the original Oakley lenses (non-polarized) and have a decent number of scratches and are cracking a bit. I would strongly recommend changing them. Unfortunately Oakley no longer makes the lenses for these (otherwise I wouldn't be selling) and only makes the ear socks and nose pieces for these glasses. There are 3rd parties that make an array of lenses for them that I've included links to below.
